page.title: 14MOTORWAY AND ROADS
page.content: Our area is very close to the {M1 {motorway}and this road can be seen from several parts of our blocks. We counted the number of vehicles going { {south} for five minutes. There were 76 cars, 39 lorries and 15 vans. From 1400 hours to 1405 hours we counted the number of vehicles travelling {north.} There were 51 cars, 51 lorries and 14 vans. Our nearest point of {access}to the motorway is approximately three miles from Kiveton. This nearness might prove important for industrial or residential development in the future. Within our area we are adequately served by good wide roads.
